column4: What is the best way to install ubuntu 9.10 desktop without including the bundled crap that comes with it? I.E. games, different browsers, movie players, etc...
Use the Server ISO and install separate packages you need
uptime provides load averages if that's what you mean, I have no idea why you want to cat /dev stuff for that
I am trying to put together a simple script to incrementally log server stats to a text file
